dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Hssss! Who dares to venture into my domain? Speak quickly or face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace, you say? Do not think your words will sway me. Why should I trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your caution. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave then, and do not return. This is your only warning.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave and not come back.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good. If you value your life, stay away from the skies I rule.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a daring one, I see. Prepare to face the terror of the skies!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Trust me, I seek no trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trust is not easily given, especially to one who trespasses. Convince me of your intentions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a gift as a gesture of peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? Interesting. Show me what you have, and maybe, just maybe, I will consider.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to prove to you. Let's end this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn one, aren't you? Very well, your fate lies in your own hands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power and will take it by force if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power-hungry, are you? Your kind is unwelcome here. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge you for dominion over the skies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, challenger. I accept your challenge. Prepare for a battle like no other!
As you wish. The skies will bear witness to your defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will back down. The skies are yours to rule.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Know your place and stay out of my sight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge of the ancient wyverns. Share your wisdom with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge-seeker, eh? The ancient wyverns are not a tale for the likes of you.
Farewell, seeker of knowledge. Leave this place and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand to know the secrets of the wyverns!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demanding and foolish. You will learn nothing but regret.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am just passing through. I mean no harm to you or your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing through, you say? Hmph, your kind always brings trouble with them. Prove your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will continue on my journey without causing any disturbances.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: If your words are true, then be on your way. Do not linger in these skies.
Farewell, stranger. Do not cross my path again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave! These skies are for all to roam!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiant till the end, I see. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for this. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, impatient one. Leave quickly before I decide to make you leave.
